fields.name: Gobble Drops
fields.description: Tiny, chewy candies that explode with fruity flavor—perfect for loud snackers!

fields.name: Choco-Lanche
fields.description: A chocolate bar so big and messy, eating it counts as an extreme sport.

fields.name: Sour Power Straws
fields.description: Super sour, super stretchy, and guaranteed to make your face pucker like a lemon!

fields.name: Bubble Trouble
fields.description: This gum lasts so long, you’ll forget what real food tastes like!

fields.name: Choco-Monster Chunks
fields.description: Thick chocolate bites designed for those who believe in ‘go big or go home’ snacking!

fields.name: Lickety Split Pops
fields.description: Lollipops that disappear faster than your self-control.

fields.name: Nerd Fuel Gummies
fields.description: Brain-boosting (not really) gummies that get you through those all-nighters!

fields.name: Caramel Chaos
fields.description: Sticky, gooey, and guaranteed to glue your teeth together!

fields.name: Fizzy Fiasco
fields.description: Pop a candy and feel it fizzle like a tiny fireworks show in your mouth!

fields.name: Rainbow Bites
fields.description: Colorful, chewy, and capable of making unicorns jealous.
